name: Hack the Planet (LuxJamII)
description:
LuxJam II - Hack the Planet!

This is a "fruit-ninja- esque" game where the goal is to destroy as many planets as possible before earning three strikes.

Left click and drag the mouse to swipe and hack (apart) planets in order to collect points.  Watch out for Suns! Allowing a planet to fall away or hitting a Sun will give you a strike. Three (3) strikes and that's game over!

Note: there is an typo with the in-game instructions. It says to hold down the "right mouse button" it should read the "left mouse button."

Enjoy!
--Diannara
